verses.verse: It shall <S%H935>be,<s%> when you have come in to the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you for an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H3427>it,<s%> and dwell therein,

that you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H7225>first<s%> of all the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H127>ground,<s%> which you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> in from your <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H7760>you;<s%> and you shall put it in a <S%H2935>basket,<s%> and shall <S%H1980>go<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose,<s%> to cause his <S%H8034>name<s%> to dwell <S%H7931>there.<s%>

You shall <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> who shall be in those <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H5046>him,<s%> "I profess this <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> that I am <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to our <S%H1>fathers<s%> to give <S%H5414>us.<s%>"

The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H2935>basket<s%> out of your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and set it <S%H3240>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

You shall <S%H6030>answer<s%> and <S%H6030>say<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> "A <S%H761>Syrian<s%> ready to <S%H6>perish<s%> was my <S%H1>father;<s%> and he went <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H1481>lived<s%> <S%H4592>there,<s%> few <S%H4962>in<s%> <S%H1471>number;<s%> and he became there a nation, <S%H1419>great,<s%> <S%H6099>mighty,<s%> and <S%H7227>populous.<s%>
The <S%H4713>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7489>dealt<s%> ill with <S%H6031>us,<s%> and afflicted <S%H5414>us,<s%> and laid on us <S%H7186>hard<s%> <S%H5656>bondage:<s%>

and we <S%H6817>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> our <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> our <S%H6040>affliction,<s%> and our <S%H5999>toil,<s%> and our <S%H3906>oppression;<s%>

and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> brought us <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and with an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4172>terror,<s%> and with <S%H226>signs,<s%> and with <S%H4159>wonders;<s%>

and he has <S%H935>brought<s%> us into this <S%H4725>place,<s%> and has <S%H5414>given<s%> us this <S%H776>land,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>

<S%H935>Now,<s%> behold, I have brought the <S%H6529>first<s%> of the fruit of the <S%H127>ground,<s%> which <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H3240>me.<s%>" You shall set it down <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

You shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in all the <S%H2896>good<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H1004>you,<s%> and to your house, <S%H3881>you,<s%> and the Levite, and the <S%H1616>foreigner<s%> who is in the midst of <S%H7130>you.<s%>

When you have made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H6237>tithing<s%> all the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of your <S%H8393>increase<s%> in the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> which is the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4643>tithing,<s%> then you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> it to the <S%H3881>Levite,<s%> to the <S%H1616>foreigner,<s%> to the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and to the <S%H490>widow,<s%> that they may <S%H398>eat<s%> within your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> and be <S%H7646>filled.<s%>

You shall <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> "I have put <S%H1197>away<s%> the holy <S%H6944>things<s%> out of my <S%H1004>house,<s%> and also have <S%H5414>given<s%> them to the <S%H3881>Levite,<s%> and to the <S%H1616>foreigner,<s%> to the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and to the <S%H490>widow,<s%> according to all your <S%H4687>commandment<s%> which you have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H5674>me:<s%> I have not transgressed any of your <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> neither have I forgotten <S%H7911>them:<s%>

I have not <S%H398>eaten<s%> of it in my <S%H205>mourning,<s%> neither have I put <S%H1197>away<s%> of <S%H2931>it,<s%> being unclean, nor <S%H5414>given<s%> of it for the <S%H4191>dead:<s%> I have <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> my <S%H430>God;<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> according to all that you have commanded <S%H6680>me.<s%>

Look <S%H8259>down<s%> from your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4583>habitation,<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H1288>bless<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H127>ground<s%> which you have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H7650>us,<s%> as you swore to our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>"

This <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commands<s%> you to <S%H6213>do<s%> these <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>ordinances:<s%> you shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them with all your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and with all your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

You have <S%H559>declared<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> to be your <S%H430>God,<s%> and that you would <S%H3212>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and his <S%H4941>ordinances,<s%> and <S%H8085>listen<s%> to his <S%H6963>voice:<s%>

and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H559>declared<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> to be a <S%H5971>people<s%> for his own <S%H5459>possession,<s%> as he has <S%H1696>promised<s%> <S%H8104>you,<s%> and that you should keep all his <S%H4687>commandments;<s%>

and to <S%H5414>make<s%> you <S%H5945>high<s%> above all <S%H1471>nations<s%> that he has <S%H6213>made,<s%> in <S%H8416>praise,<s%> and in <S%H8034>name,<s%> and in <S%H8597>honor;<s%> and that you may be a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> as he has <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>
